Home

Nyctophile

4 JUN 2016 • 1 min read
Those who love stars are not afraid of the dark


As the little silver coat of moon
spreads across my bones…
I hear the shining stars
sing a serenade in vivid tones…
I wonder what this breeze is saying ?
Perhaps some secret talk…
I see the blissful sky is telling
come my child lets’ walk…
I wonder who talks to you ?
Don’t you feel you’re alone …?
The night smiles and reminds me
of the silence that I have not known…
My eyes shut down
as I embrace the darkness…
It quickly throws me
into a silhouette of calmness…
Am I in heaven ?
or am I in a void …?
Maybe it’s the guitar
and some Pink Floyd…


--A Pink Floyd fan.
